title: SLFP to decide on Ranil’s invitation today (16)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Central Committee of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party will convene this morning (16).
The meeting will be held at the Freedom Party headquarters at 10 AM today (16) under the Chairmanship of former President Maithripala Sirisena.
The SLFP said that a final agreement will be reached on the invitation extended by the Prime Minister to form a new Government.
